DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability escalate dos ORM-12741 healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Study With Single Ascending Doses ORM-12741
DOC.criteria: Good general health ascertain detailed medical history physical examination Males 18 45 year Body mass index ( BMI ) 1830 kg/m2 Weight 5590 kg Evidence clinically significant cardiovascular , renal , hepatic , haematological , gastrointestinal , pulmonary , metabolicendocrine , neurological , urogenital psychiatric disease Any condition require regular concomitant treatment include herbal product likely need concomitant treatment study Susceptibility severe allergic reaction Regular consumption 14 unit alcohol per week Current use nicotinecontaining product 5 cigarette equivalent/day Inability refrain use nicotinecontaining product stay study centre Inability refrain consume caffeinecontaining beverage stay study centre Blood donation loss significant amount blood within 3 month prior screen visit Abnormal finding ECG , vital sign , laboratory test physical examination Participation drug study within 3 month prior start study
